mosinstall.name: SSO
mosinstall.author: Sam Moffatt (Original Work: Tomo Cerovsek & Damjan Murn)

queries.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__sso_providers` ( `providerId` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `siteUrl` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `siteName` varchar(150) NOT NULL, `description` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `comments` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `abbreviation` varchar(4) NOT NULL, `ipAddress` varchar(15) NOT NULL, `country` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `countryCode` varchar(2) NOT NULL, `language` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `status` varchar(32) NOT NULL, `published` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`providerId`), UNIQUE KEY `abbreviation` (`abbreviation`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__sso_handles` ( `handle` varchar(128) NOT NULL default '', `spId` varchar(100) NOT NULL default '', `username` varchar(25) NOT NULL default '', `userIP` varchar(15) NOT NULL default '', `time` timestamp NOT NULL default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`handle`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM;
